title: To Do
content:
To Do

Overall
	Get rid of all buttons they are a distraction, maybe make it a keybind to hide them all
	keep all buttons in pop ups though
	ensure text in buttons are readable, apply catch alls like drop shadows or imrpove dynamic color settings
	we have theme selection now we need font selection popup and cycle keybind

Main note area
	get rid of mention of auto-save in the top right corner
	ensure it dynamically scales with the width, meaning no horizontal scroll bar

Enhance features with the search bar such as 
	being able to search for date

Cards
	They show date last touched at the bottom, is this valuable or is there something better to be doing
	we have search do we need filter as well
	ability to drag and drop notes around but without using the mouse
	default grid view, but we should have keybind to go to listview
	we need a way to modify how the auto size works, something like a modifier to adjust column count

Stats
	need keybind to show stats, on gridview show overall, within main note show specific to that note
	potential way to "pin" stats somewhere visible
	List of stat ideas
		character count
		word count
		wpm
		time based stuff like streak, graph of note creation over time, notes per day
		time in note
		
Ideas
	Export plugin for common text formats like mla ect


butt butt butt butt butt butt butt butt butt butt 


rhe
